Protocols/Selectable.html.name: Selectable
Protocols/Selectable.html.abstract: All selectable subviews of the SelectionView must implement Selectable protocol.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: selectableSubviews
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: The list of views that can be selected.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: isMultiselectable
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: A Boolean value that determines the possibility of multiple views selection. Default is false.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: multiselectionView
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: The view that shows the frame of multiple selection with pan gesture.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: toggleSelectedState(of:to:)
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: Toggles the selection state of the view.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: addSelectableSubview(_:)
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: Adds the view to the array of selectable subviews.

Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.name: removeSelectableSubview(_:)
Classes/SelectionView.html#/s:13Selectio.abstract: Removes the view from the array of selectable subviews.

Classes/SelectionView.html.name: SelectionView
Classes/SelectionView.html.abstract: The SelectionView class provides selection mechanism and container for views that may be selected.
